name: phonebook_backend
description: backend for phonebook app, fullstackopen part 3

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../../_fullstackopen/part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r dist ../../../_fullstackopen_backend/phonebook_backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m 3.17_phonebook_backend_put_user_exists && git push

author: Enrique Anton Lopez
